roleset.name: emit dry random noise
roleset.note: RUSTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rustle' based on sentences in brown. (from rustle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: rustle birds
example.text: She fell asleep leaning on her hand, hearing the house creaking as though it were a living a private life of its own these two hundred years , hearing the birds rustling in their cages ...

roleset.name: steal
roleset.note: RUSTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rustle' based on sentences in brown. (from rustle.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: rustle cattle
example.text: First he thought of the time he had ridden to Gavin and told him how [his cattle]-1 were being rustled [*-1]at the far end of the valley [*T*-2].
